word_json: {"wordRank":3,"headWord":"numerous","content":{"word":{"wordHead":"numerous","wordId":"CET4_3_3","content":{"sentence":{"sentences":[{"sContent":"Numerous attempts have been made to hide the truth.","sCn":"为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。"},{"sContent":"The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.","sCn":"那两位领导人已经多次合作。"}],"desc":"例句"},"realExamSentence":{"sentences":[{"sContent":"...those who longed for longevity visited Mount Hua on a regular basis because there were numerous medical herbs...","sourceInfo":{"level":"CET4","year":"2017.12","type":"文本题"}},{"sContent":"...I have already sweated through numerous in-class midterms and finals...","sourceInfo":{"level":"CET4","year":"2017.12","type":"阅读理解"}},{"sContent":"...the sound relationship between two generations requires the integration of numerous measures derived from the joint effort of parents...","sourceInfo":{"paper":"第一套","level":"CET4","year":"2017.12","type":"写作题"}}],"desc":"真题例句"},"usphone":"'numərəs","syno":{"synos":[{"pos":"adj","tran":"许多的，很多的","hwds":[{"w":"many"},{"w":"multiple"},{"w":"hundred"},{"w":"plenty"}]}],"desc":"同近"},"ukphone":"'njuːmərəs","ukspeech":"numerous&type=1","remMethod":{"val":" numer(数) ＋ ous(…的) → 众多的","desc":"记忆"},"relWord":{"rels":[{"pos":"n","words":[{"hwd":"numerousness","tran":" 多数"}]}],"desc":"同根"},"usspeech":"numerous&type=2","trans":[{"tranCn":" 众多的","descOther":"英释","pos":"adj","descCn":"中释","tranOther":"many"}]}}},"bookId":"CET4_3"}
